topics.body:
Hey guys I'm back...I think, and I'm still alive.

Also, EHAN's finally -tortured- convinced me to marathon all of Nichijou, and I'm going to find out if it's as good as you guys make it out to be. I did try to watch it a few months ago, but it was during a bad time and I was still having incoming college freshmen willies.

Maybe it'll be better than I remember?
Doubt it, but I'm gonna try to watch all of it...even if it kills me to death.

-I HOPE YOU'RE HAPPY BROTHER-
-BUT IF I WATCH THE ENTIRE SHOW, _AND STILL DON'T LIKE IT_, THEN I HAVE ALL OF THE FREEDOM TO COMPLAIN AS I PLEASE.-
